pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.controller

Class ReturnBookController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.controller.ReturnBookController

  • @Controller
 @Scope(value="session")
 @RequestMapping(value="/return-book")
 @PropertySource(value="classpath:systemMessages.properties") @PropertySource(value="classpath:library-configuration.properties")
public class ReturnBookController
extends Object
    The controller class is used to return the view depending on the user request. This controller contains the views of:
    • "return-book-choose-user"
    • "return-book-choose-books"
    • "return-book-confirmation"


    This controller also perform the actions on the books.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

      Constructs a ReturnBookController with the BookService, UserService, PdfService, Environment, AccessLevelControl and SearchEngineUtils.

      • showBorrowBookForm

        @RequestMapping(value="/return-book-choose-user")
public String showBorrowBookForm(Locale locale,
                                                                                    org.springframework.ui.Model theModel,
                                                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="returnBookSelectedUserId")
                                                                                    String returnBookSelectedUserId,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="returnBookFirstName")
                                                                                    String returnBookFirstName,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="returnBookLastName")
                                                                                    String returnBookLastName,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="returnBookEmail")
                                                                                    String returnBookEmail,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="returnBookPesel")
                                                                                    String returnBookPesel,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="returnBookStartResult")
                                                                                    Integer returnBookStartResult)
        Returns the view of "return-book-choose-user" with model attributes:
        • returnBookStartResult - The value of first index of the results
        • amountOfResults - The number of total results
        • showMoreLinkValue - The value of "showMoreLink"
        • resultRange - The description of pagination
        • showLessLinkValue - The value of "showLessLink"
        • usersList -
        Parameters:
        locale - The Locale containing the user's locale
        theModel - The Model containing the data passed to the view
        request - The HttpServletRequest containing the HttpSession
        returnBookSelectedUserId - The String containing the id of the user
        returnBookFirstName - The String containing the first name of the user
        returnBookLastName - The String containing the last name of the user
        returnBookEmail - The String containing the email of the user
        returnBookPesel - The String containing the PESEL of the user
        returnBookStartResult - The Integer containing the first index of the results
        Returns:
        The String representing the name of the view

        Throws:
